name: ExtraCells
tagline: A mighty Add-On for Applied Energistics
body:
### Welcome to Extra Cells.
This awesome AppliedEnergistics Add-On adds 4 bigger-sized storage cells, an adjustable on and a special storage. Also it's pretty cool :P



### Authors and Contributors
Me, M3gaFr3ak, I am the author of the Mod. Cyntain has provided me some awesome textures, PaleoCrafter helped me with the structure and some PacketHandling!

### Support or Contact
Having trouble? Write me on the bugtracker on github! You may also check out the threads on [Minecraft-Forums](http://www.minecraftforum.net/topic/1801643-) and [FTB-Forums](http://forum.feed-the-beast.com/threads/ae-addon-m3gas-extracells.24467/)!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
